thread.title: Alshon Jeffery Believes Carson Wentz Can Win An MVP Someday
thread.title_full: Alshon Jeffery Believes Carson Wentz Can Win An MVP Someday

author: CBS Philly
title: Alshon Jeffery Believes Carson Wentz Can Win An MVP Someday
text:
Alshon Jeffery Believes Carson Wentz Can Win An MVP Someday March 10, 2017 2:10 PM By Andrew Porter Filed Under: Eagles Alshon Jeffery (Photo by Leon Halip/Getty Images) and Carson Wentz (Photo by Stacy Revere/Getty Images) 
PHILADELPHIA (CBS) — Alshon Jeffery wrote a piece about leaving Chicago and coming to Philadelphia that will give Eagles fans chills. 
Related: Eagles Sign Alshon Jeffery To One-Year Deal 
The new Eagles receiver wrote for The Players’ Tribune that he believes Carson Wentz has the kind of talent to be a “legit MVP contender.” 
“I actually told him that the other day,” Jeffery wrote. “He and I were texting back and forth after the news broke that I was coming to Philly. I told him that I felt like he was good enough to win an MVP someday, and that it was going to be my job to help him win it. 
He straight up said he didn’t care about being MVP. 
He wanted to win a championship.” ANDDDD also Welcome @TheWorldof_AJ to the squad. Big things ahead!!!
